entry.title: New release for Requestly: June 16, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🛠️ Improvements

  • API client cookies are now set using the Set-Cookie header and are included in subsequent requests.
  • API Client now shows a clearer message instead of just "Failed to fetch" when there's a DNS resolution error.

🐛 Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where the unsaved changes indicator didn’t disappear after saving changes with updated query parameters.
  • Resolved a cursor jump issue in the editor for a smoother typing experience.
  • Fixed broken key-value pair parsing that caused incorrect behavior in some rules.
  • Boolean values now render properly across the app, instead of being hidden or misrepresented.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: June 24, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🚀 New

  • You can now move your Header Editor rules to Requestly with one click, seamless migration made easy. Learn more

✨ Improvements

  • Added validation to block invalid header names in API requests.

🐛 Fixes

  • API Client now displays the complete set of response headers. Previously, only a limited few were shown.
  • Fixed scroll issues in API Client request tabs for smoother navigation.
  • Fixed missing or incorrect icons in Rule and Mock editors.
  • Fixed a bug that was adding duplicate listeners in the background.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: June 30, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

🚀 New

  • Drag and drop support added to Collections for easier organization.

🛠️ Improvements

  • Windows app updated to the latest version.
  • Fixed an issue where the Network Details panel would disappear from the recorded session on hover.
  • Collections are now imported with the correct hierarchy and order — previously, they appeared as a flat list.

entry.title: New release for Requestly: July 22, 2025
entry.content:
What's Changed

:rocket: New

  • You can now use Requestly rules to intercept and modify network requests in Selenium and other headless automation tools, making it easier to test, debug, and fine-tune your automated workflows. Learn more

🛠️ Improvements

  • Enabled email notifications for shared list imports, keeping users better informed.
  • Enhanced the environment selector dropdown UI. Users can now also deselect an environment—something that wasn't possible before.

:bug: Fixes

  • Resolved unexpected errors that occurred when quitting the desktop app.
  • The API client now automatically expands parent collections when a request is searched within a collection, improving navigation and usability.
